body:
You probably see these threads a lot, or maybe not, i haven't been here lately :v
How do i even PVP?; I haven't played seriously for a year. I feel like half the time my hits don't even land.

I have gotten tired of playing MW2, and want to come back to my avicus, but i really cant if i get my ass kicked 96% of the time.
body_tagged:

title: How do i even PVP?

replies.body:
click at enemy at at least 5 cps
strafe with a + d
w tap for improved kb to enemy
s tap for improved reach 
practice your aim
get good mods/regedit/dns?
have fun
replies.body_tagged:
click at enemy at at least 5 cps
strafe with a + d
w tap for improved kb to enemy
s tap for improved reach 
practice your aim
get good mods/regedit/dns?
have fun

replies.body:
Get a good gaming toaster
Practice on great pvp servers, so mineplex
Cover both of your eyes whilst pvping
Install autoclicker
So good xaxa
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Left Click
Shake your mouse to make yourself look cooler
Don't use default texture pack
Make sure you have a hack to enhance your crits to make yourself look like you click fast
Make sure you have more than 150 ping

You are set to go!

replies.body:
Learn to jitter or butterfly click (you dont really got to, 6cps is plenty)
Learn to w tap, or get good straighline comboes
learn to build to build up walls fast to aoid bow spammers
use a good fps pack or if you got a good computer, a pack that you think helps you play better
learn to hotkey and know where things are in your hotbar
blockhits are a 10/10
get good with the bow, it isnt too hard
A and D are good to use, but w/o speed 2 it is a little harder to get good strafes
practice aim, and find a sensitiity that works for you
Play smart, play more, and play some music if that is your thing

A and D are good to use, but w/o speed 2 it is a little harder to get good strafes
practice aim, and find a sensitiity that works for you
Play smart, play more, and play some music if that is your thing

replies.body:
get a gaming chair
throw your headset across your room whenever you die
afk in teamspeak so you look like you are cool
play hcf
say L everytime you kill someone 
be extremely toxic

if non of these work; try this https://www.vape.gg/

replies.body: All u have to do is have a ping under 50, click at the guy and sprint forwards at the same time. If u followed those steps then u will be able to pvp in no time. If u have 200 ping or higher than it's a lot harder

replies.body: For w tapping should i just spam W as much as possible or is it more like hit tap hit tap?
replies.body_tagged: For w tapping should i just spam W as much as possible or is it more like hit tap hit tap?

reply_to.body: someone who knows how to strafe, w tap and/or s tap will rape you every single time if you do that, especially if you don't know how to straightline well

replies.body:
it's about timing it, which most people (including myself) don't do extremely well. you don't want to spam it at all

there are controversial opinions about when exactly to tap w, but as far as i've learned you should do it just as you're about to hit your opponent. people like brick would know better than me about this though
replies.body_tagged:
it's about timing it, which most people (including myself) don't do extremely well. you don't want to spam it at all

there are controversial opinions about when exactly to tap w, but as far as i've learned you should do it just as you're about to hit your opponent. people like brick would know better than me about this though

replies.body: When w tapping you need to wait until they have taken kb... watch a video on it (probably Latenci's). It is all about timing it correctly and being patient
